name: just.add(eggs) [GAME JAM]
description:
just.add(eggs) is a very short and simple game created in five days for Juice Jam. This experimental game involves typing in commands to make a bowl of cookies, following grandma's recipe.

- Accessibly features such as plain fonts for the instruction

- A lot of sound effects and tweening for that juicy feel!

- Relaxing and no pressure gameplay

- Easy enough that no previous programming experience is required!

- Programming and art by Niandra

- Text parser by Niandra

- Text rendering by Scribble

- Sound effects from Sounds By George

- Sound effects from Freesounds.org

- Music by Bensound.com

- Mouse cursor by Kenny
